title: BlackRock's Brownback: See M&A Wave in 2026
description: Russ Brownback, BlackRock’s Deputy CIO and Head of Global Macro Positioning, says 2% productivity growth allows the economy to expand without adding hours worked, and that generative AI is poised to push productivity even higher. He speaks with Romaine Bostick and Katie Greifeld on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
